summary: "Blood Meridian" is a historical novel by Cormac McCarthy about a teenage boy from Tennessee who joins a group of scalp hunters called the Glanton gang. They kill Native Americans and others for money and fun. The story is set in the American frontier in the 1840s. A scary character named Judge Holden, who is very smart and strong, becomes the main villain. Although people didn't like it at first, many now consider it McCarthy's best work and an important American novel.
title: Blood Meridian
